nodes.text: Erib Kurrugh was a male Trandoshan criminal who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War. He was one of the founders of the Sand Splitters, a criminal organization on Tatooine, along with Saul Rouse. During this time, he operated out of the Sand Splitter Cave on Tatooine. Circa 1 ABY, the Sand Splitters infiltrated Jabba's Palace and stole from Jabba Desilijic Tiure. Saul Rouse and Erib Kurrugh were killed by Jabba's henchmen sent by Ree-Yees.
